Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for chromID™ MRSA selective and differential chromogenic medium for detection of MRSA.
Indications for Use Summary: For the qualitative detection of MRSA colonization in anterior nares and skin/skin structure infection specimens to aid in prevention and control of MRSA in healthcare settings; not intended to diagnose, guide, or monitor therapy for MRSA infections or provide methicillin susceptibility results.
